artview.plugins.Mapper¶

class artview.plugins.Mapper(Vradar=None, Vgrid=None, name='Mapper', parent=None)[source]¶

Bases: artview.core.core.Component

Interface for executing pyart.map.grid_from_radars

__init__(Vradar=None, Vgrid=None, name='Mapper', parent=None)[source]¶

Initialize the class to create the interface.

Parameters:

[Optional] :

Vradar : Variable instance

Radar signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

Vgrid : Variable instance

Grid signal variable. A value of None initializes an empty Variable.

name : string

Field Radiobutton window name.

parent : PyQt instance

Parent instance to associate to this class. If None, then Qt owns, otherwise associated w/ parent PyQt instance

Methods

Mapper.NewRadar(variable, strong) Display Py-Art’s docstring for help.
Mapper.addEspecificOptions(item) Mount Options Layout depending on gridding algorithm.
Mapper.addGeneralOptions() Mount Options Layout for grid_from_radars
Mapper.constantRoiOptions() Mount Options Layout for constant radius of influence.
Mapper.distBeamRoiOptions() Mount Options Layout for dist beam radius of influence.
Mapper.distRoiOptions() Mount Options Layout for dist radius of influence.
Mapper.grid_from_radars() Mount Options and execute grid_from_radars.
Mapper.guiStart([parent]) Graphical interface for starting this class
Mapper.mapGatesToGridOptions() Mount Options Layout for map_gates_to_grid
Mapper.mapToGridOptions() Mount Options Layout for map_to_grid

Attributes

Vgrid = None¶

see Shared Variables Table

Vradar = None¶

see Shared Variables Table
